text: KBYS (88.3 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Lake Charles, Louisiana. The station is owned by McNeese State University, and airs a community radio format. The station was assigned the KBYS call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on June 15, 2011. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FCC Public Inspection File for KBYS * Category:Radio stations in Louisiana Category:Radio stations established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in Louisiana Category:Community radio stations in the United States Category:College radio stations in Louisiana Category:Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana
title: KBYS (FM)
